description.lang: The Certified Installer Tool (CIT) is a Z-Wave controller with a collection of tools and features to aid in the installation of Z-Wave networks or to help diagnose, repair, or improve existing networks.The tool includes the ability to query devices to learn about them, to show routing and neighbor information, measure link quality, show and track noise, and even display application layer messages that are heard by the CIT (Z-Wave Network Sniffer = zNiffer)
Z-Wave Plus LifelineIf Controller Factory Default is used, the CIT will send a Device Reset Locally notification to the node(s) listed in this association group.
